definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb

sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.

sentences.english: X axis and Y axis adopt ball spiral rods with excellent precisions and low friction factors.

sentences.english: The magnetic coupling also can be used in autoclaves and mixers .

sentences.english: Speed change gears is widely used in mechanical transmission system.

sentences.english: Base from steel plate and welded into a channel for supporting the shell and gear.

sentences.english: Feed and dressing movements are controled by means of two independent driving systems.
sentences.chinese: 机床的进给及修正，由二个互不干涉的传动机构执行。

sentences.english: Main transmission system in machine-tool can be divided into two types: regular and irregular speed-change.

sentences.english: Transmits by high quality three chains.
Plan and schedule qualification tests for each motor or gear component.

sentences.english: The driving system is an important part of twin-screw extruder.

sentences.english: In The author analyses the average load component of involve planet gear wheel transmission.

sentences.english: An optional nickel-plated input unit and foot mounts are available for right-angle drive applications.
sentences.chinese: 可选的镀镍输入装置和脚坐骑为直角传动应用提供。

sentences.english: Mainly discussed the technical development of the driving system with high torque twin screw extruder.

sentences.english: This forms the basis of an Atkinson-cycle-based hybrid electric drivetrain.

sentences.english: Planetary drive with double trochoid and free rollers is a new type of drive.
